2FH.SG.summary: Fourlis Holdings S.A., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the retail trading activities in Greece, Romania, Cyprus, Bulgaria, Turkey, and internationally. It is involved in the retail trade of home furniture and household goods through IKEA stores; and sporting goods through INTERSPORT and TAF stores. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 16 TAF stores, including 13 in Greece and three in Turkey. It also operates 7 IKEA stores, including 5 stores in Greece, 1 in Cyprus, and 1 in Bulgaria; 6 pick-up and order points in Greece and 3 pick-up and order points in Bulgaria; and 3 e-commerce stores in Greece, Cyprus, and Bulgaria. In addition, the company operates 119 INTERSPORT stores, including 50 stores in Greece, 31 in Romania, 24 in Turkey, 9 in Bulgaria, and 6 in Cyprus, as well as e-commerce stores in Greece, Romania, and Cyprus. Further, it has franchised sporting goods stores under the THE ATHLETE'S FOOT name in Greece and Turkey; and provides catering services in Greece, Cyprus, and Bulgaria, as well as warehousing services. The company was formerly known as Fourlis Bros S.A. and changed its name to Fourlis Holding S.A. in March 2000. Fourlis Holding S.A. was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Marousi, Greece.

FLLIY.long_name: Folli-Follie Commercial Manufacturing and Technical Societe Anonyme
FLLIY.summary: Folli-Follie Commercial Manufacturing and Technical Societe Anonyme operates in the fields of jewelry manufacturing, apparel, footwear, and cosmetics in Greece and internationally. The company operates through Jewelry, Watches, Accessories; Apparel & Footwear & Cosmetics; and Department Stores. It designs, manufactures, processes, and markets jewelry; watches; and fashion accessories, including handbags, wallets, leather goods, pashminas, and sunglasses. The company is also involved in the wholesale and retail of products under the Folli Follie and Links of London brands; and wholesale of products at selected outlets internationally. In addition, it operates three department stores in Athens, as well as two department stores in Thessaloniki under the attica brand name; and two discount department stores under the Factory Outlet brand name. Further, the company engages in the retail and wholesale of branded apparel, footwear, perfumes, cosmetics, and other products. Folli-Follie Commercial Manufacturing and Technical Societe Anonyme was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Athens, Greece.

FP6N.SG.summary: Frigoglass S.A.I.C., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacturing, trading, and distribution of commercial refrigeration units and packaging materials for the beverage industry. The company operates through Ice Cold Merchandise Operations and Glass Operations segments. It also offers glass bottles and containers, primarily for soft drinks, beer, and spirits industries, as well as in the cosmetics and pharmaceutical industries; and produces plastic crates and metal crowns. In addition, the company provides integrated, standard and post warranty, repair call management, rebranding and refurbishment, one-to-one placement, spare parts management, preventive maintenance, and technical training services. It operates in east Europe, west Europe, Africa, the Middle East, Asia, Oceania, and the United States. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Athens, Greece.

GF8.F.long_name: Greek Organization of Football Prognostics S.A.
GF8.F.summary: Greek Organization of Football Prognostics S.A., together with its subsidiaries, operates and manages numerical lottery and sports betting games. It operates through Lotteries, Sports Betting, Instant & Passives, VLTs, Telecommunication & eMoney Services, and Other segments. The company holds rights to conduct, manage, organize, and operate six numerical lottery games comprising TZOKER, LOTTO, PROTO, EXTRA 5, SUPER 3, and KINO; three sports and other betting games, such as PAME STOIXIMA, PAME STOIXIMA Virtual Sports, PROPO, PROPOGOAL, and HORSE RACING STOIXIMA; three lottery games, including LAIKO, ETHNIKO, and STATE; and Instant SCRATCH games. It also holds license for the instalment and operation of 35,000 video lottery terminals. In addition, the company provides transaction services through electronic means; and intangible talk time selling and bill payments services. Further, it organizes and conducts terrestrial, land-based, and online horseracing mutual betting; and provides software services. The company offers its products and services through online and distribution networks, including agents, street vendors, retailers, wholesalers, and 9,468 points of sales in Greece; 428 play stores; and 199 stores in Cyprus. Greek Organisation of Football Prognostics S.A. was founded in 1958 and is based in Athens, Greece.

IRLTF.long_name: Intralot S.A. Integrated Lottery Systems and Services
IRLTF.summary: Intralot S.A. Integrated Lottery Systems and Services supplies integrated gaming and transaction processing systems, game content, sports betting management, and interactive gaming services to state-licensed gaming organizations worldwide. The company supplies hardware and software, including gaming machines, central computer systems, gaming software, communication systems, etc., as well as offers installation, technical support, and maintenance services to lotteries. It is also involved in the design, organization, and/or management of games; advertising and sales promotion activities; establishment of sales network; and provision of risk management for fixed odds games, etc., as well as game operating services. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Athens, Greece.

IRLTY.long_name: Intralot S.A. Integrated Lottery Systems and Services
IRLTY.summary: Intralot S.A. Integrated Lottery Systems and Services supplies integrated gaming and transaction processing systems, game content, sports betting management, and interactive gaming services to state-licensed gaming organizations worldwide. JUMSY.summary: Jumbo S.A. engages in the retail of toys, baby products, gift articles, household products, stationery, seasonal and decoration items, books, and related products. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 80 stores, including 52 stores in Greece, 5 stores in Cyprus, 9 stores in Bulgaria, and 14 stores in Romania. It also operates e-jumbo, an on line store. In addition, the company is involved in the wholesale of toys and related products to third parties. Jumbo S.A. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Athens, Greece.
